org.apache.stanbol.client.contenthub.search.services

Interface StanbolContenthubSolrSearchService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    StanbolService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StanbolContenthubSolrSearchServiceImpl

    public interface StanbolContenthubSolrSearchService
extends StanbolService
    Define operations for Stanbol ContentHub SolrSearch
    Author:
    Rafa Haro

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String STANBOL_CONTENTHUB_SOLR_PATH
      ContentHub Solr Path

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SolrSearchResult facetedSearch(java.lang.String index, org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrQuery query, java.util.List<java.lang.String> facetFields)
      Return a SolrSearchResult object containing a list of ContentItem grouped by facets as ContentHub solr search results using the SolrQuery passed by parameter.
      SolrSearchResult facetedSearch(java.lang.String index, org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrQuery query, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> facets)
      Return a SolrSearchResult object containing a list of ContentItem as a result of ContentHub Solr Search using the SolrQuery and the Facets Constraints passed by parameter.
      SolrSearchResult facetedSearch(java.lang.String index, org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrQuery query, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> facets, java.util.List<java.lang.String> facetFields)
      Return a SolrSearchResult object containing a list of ContentItem grouped by the passed list of facets fields as a result of ContentHub Solr Search using the SolrQuery and the Facets Constraints passed by parameter.
      SolrSearchResult facetedSearch(java.lang.String index, java.lang.String query, java.util.List<java.lang.String> facetFields)
      Return a SolrSearchResult object containing a list of ContentItem grouped by facets as a result of ContentHub solr search using the String query with a proper SolrQuery Format passed by parameter.
      SolrSearchResult facetedSearch(java.lang.String index, java.lang.String query, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> facets)
      Return a SolrSearchResult object containing a list of ContentItem as a result of ContentHub Solr Search using the String query with a proper SolrQuery Format and the Facets Constraints passed by parameter.
      SolrSearchResult facetedSearch(java.lang.String index, java.lang.String query, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> facets, java.util.List<java.lang.String> facetFields)
      Return a SolrSearchResult object containing a list of ContentItem grouped by the passed list of facets fields as a result of ContentHub Solr Search using the String query with a proper SolrQuery Format and the Facets Constraints passed by parameter.
      java.lang.String getFieldType(java.lang.String index, java.lang.String fieldName)
      Return Facet Field type by Facet Name

      Return a SolrSearchResult object containing a list of ContentItem as a result of ContentHub solr search using the SolrQuery passed by parameter.
      SolrSearchResult search(java.lang.String index, java.lang.String query)

    • Method Detail

      • search

        SolrSearchResult search(java.lang.String index,
                      java.lang.String query)
                        throws StanbolServiceException
        Return a SolrSearchResult object containing a list of ContentItem as a result of ContentHub solr search using the String query with a proper SolrQuery Format passed by parameter. Each ContentItem is parsed from a SolrDocument and is stored in the result as a DocumentResult
        Parameters:
        index - Index where the search is going to be performed
        query - Query string in solr format
        Returns:
        List of found ContentItem
        Throws:
        StanbolServiceException

      • search

        SolrSearchResult search(java.lang.String index,
                      org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrQuery query)
                        throws StanbolServiceException
        Return a SolrSearchResult object containing a list of ContentItem as a result of ContentHub solr search using the SolrQuery passed by parameter. Each ContentItem is parsed from a SolrDocument and is stored in the result as a DocumentResult
        Parameters:
        index - Index where the search is going to be performed
        query - Solr Query Object
        Returns:
        List of found ContentItem
        Throws:
        StanbolServiceException

      • facetedSearch

        SolrSearchResult facetedSearch(java.lang.String index,
                             java.lang.String query,
                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> facetFields)
                               throws StanbolServiceException
        Return a SolrSearchResult object containing a list of ContentItem grouped by facets as a result of ContentHub solr search using the String query with a proper SolrQuery Format passed by parameter. Each ContentItem is parsed from a SolrDocument and is stored in the result as a DocumentResult
        Parameters:
        index - Index where the search is going to be performed
        query - Query string in solr format
        facetFields - List of fields to be faceted
        Returns:
        List of found ContentItem
        Throws:
        StanbolServiceException

      • facetedSearch

        SolrSearchResult facetedSearch(java.lang.String index,
                             java.lang.String query,
                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> facets)
                               throws StanbolServiceException
        Return a SolrSearchResult object containing a list of ContentItem as a result of ContentHub Solr Search using the String query with a proper SolrQuery Format and the Facets Constraints passed by parameter. Each constraint should contain a list of Facet values for each Facet Field Name in the Map.
        Parameters:
        index - Index where the search is going to be performed
        query - Query String in Solr Format
        facets - Facets field name - field value Map
        Returns:
        List of found ContentItem
        Throws:
        StanbolServiceException

      • facetedSearch

        SolrSearchResult facetedSearch(java.lang.String index,
                             org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrQuery query,
                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> facetFields)
                               throws StanbolServiceException
        Return a SolrSearchResult object containing a list of ContentItem grouped by facets as ContentHub solr search results using the SolrQuery passed by parameter. Each ContentItem is parsed from a SolrDocument and is stored in the result as a DocumentResult
        Parameters:
        index - Index where the search is going to be performed
        query - Solr Query Object
        facetFields - List of fields to be faceted
        Returns:
        List of found ContentItem
        Throws:
        StanbolServiceException

      • facetedSearch

        SolrSearchResult facetedSearch(java.lang.String index,
                             org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrQuery query,
                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> facets)
                               throws StanbolServiceException
        Return a SolrSearchResult object containing a list of ContentItem as a result of ContentHub Solr Search using the SolrQuery and the Facets Constraints passed by parameter. Each constraint should contain a list of Facet values for each Facet Field Name in the Map.
        Parameters:
        index - Index where the search is going to be performed
        query - Solr Query Object
        facets - Facets field name - field value Map
        Returns:
        List of found ContentItem
        Throws:
        StanbolServiceException

      • facetedSearch

        SolrSearchResult facetedSearch(java.lang.String index,
                             org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrQuery query,
                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> facets,
                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> facetFields)
                               throws StanbolServiceException
        Return a SolrSearchResult object containing a list of ContentItem grouped by the passed list of facets fields as a result of ContentHub Solr Search using the SolrQuery and the Facets Constraints passed by parameter. Each constraint should contain a list of Facet values for each Facet Field Name in the Map.
        Parameters:
        index - Index where the search is going to be performed
        query - Solr Query Object
        facets - Facets field name - field value Map
        facetFields - List of Facet Fields
        Returns:
        List of found ContentItem
        Throws:
        StanbolServiceException

      • facetedSearch

        SolrSearchResult facetedSearch(java.lang.String index,
                             java.lang.String query,
                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> facets,
                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> facetFields)
                               throws StanbolServiceException
        Return a SolrSearchResult object containing a list of ContentItem grouped by the passed list of facets fields as a result of ContentHub Solr Search using the String query with a proper SolrQuery Format and the Facets Constraints passed by parameter. Each constraint should contain a list of Facet values for each Facet Field Name in the Map.
        Parameters:
        index - Index where the search is going to be performed
        query - Solr String Query
        facets - Facets field name - field value Map
        facetFields - List of Facet Fields
        Returns:
        List of found ContentItem
        Throws:
        StanbolServiceException

        Return Facet Field type by Facet Name
        Parameters:

        fieldName - Name of the Facet Field
        Returns:
        Facet Type
